summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2219, for the improvement of Jackson Street and King Street, each from 5th Avenue South to 6th Avenue South, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, by replanking the same with plank 5 inches in thickness, under Ordinance No. 22510 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
